Text:
Great quality release 9.5/10.  Scary to think the Zodiac Killer is still out there somewhere.  Worth a watch.

Zodiac: http://www.moviecynics.com/item/564
Can you turn the subs off?

No, if the subs are hardcoded in an avi file, they can't be turned off. 

Bolinat would have been wiser to either pack the subs as a separate .srt file, or package the film in a .mkv (matroska) container, where the subs can be made optional.

The only I can think of to hardcode subs in an avi file is because some commercial DivX players don't accept external subs. Perhaps Bolinat made this file with that audience mind.
